data.eml:eml: A new invasive weed-feeding species of Polypedilum (Pentapedilum) Kieffer from South Africa (Diptera: Chironomidae, Chironominae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Andersen, Trond, Bello González, Orestes C., Baars, Jan-Robert, Earle, William (2015): A new invasive weed-feeding species of Polypedilum (Pentapedilum) Kieffer from South Africa (Diptera: Chironomidae, Chironominae). Zootaxa 4000 (5): 559-570, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4000.5.5
